title: yo momma's so fat that.....  (+ bonus question,Riot answer please)
body:
- In the twisted treeline,she captures both altars at the same time
- She wards the entire map
- She takes the xp from every champion in the map
- When she plays jungler, she gank in the 3 lanes at the same time
- She is immuned to knockups
- Warmog heals her only once before running out of power (and tears itself)
- She eats {{champion:31}} 
- when {{champion:8}} uses Q on her,he get more fat than {{champion:79}}  and dies from a heart attack
- When she get banned in draft, she takes the 5 remaining slot for ban
- She is ranked Bronze V - Challenger
- Everyone gravitates around her
- She can't wear items (and {{champion:54}}  is a moutain...).

 I have more in mind but i'd like to see yours :p

I also have a questiion about Malphite chogath and other huge champions. When they buy an item, does the item adapt to their height or do the champions put them in a part of their body (eat them etc..)

replies.body: Yo mommas so fat, that when {{champion:9}}  drains her, he gets diabetes.

yo momma so fat, when her health drops, I win with Collateral Damage :)){{champion:202}}

Yo momma's fat, that she's immune to knock backs.
All the good shit was already taken and I can't come up with anything, plus you didn't use knock backs, sue me for being unoriginal >:(
Wait, I got one.
Yo momma's so fat that pass through skillshots hit her twice....I suck at this.
yo mommas so fat when they added her as a champ to the game they had to change the mini map to a maxi-map just to fit her icon
I should get her on my team then
Yo momma's so fat... er... I f{{champion:6}} the punchline.
